title:
The gravitational energy-momentum pseudo-tensor of conformally invariant
  theories of gravity
abstract:
We construct the gravitational energy-momentum pseudo-tensor of up to
fourth-order conformally invariant theories of gravity. Then we linearize the
pseudo-tensor and use its average over a macroscopic region to find the energy
and momentum carried by the plane gravitational waves of the three main
conformally invariant theories of gravity.
